masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Dude, someone hacked my Instagram and posted that I wet the bed until I was 12! The trail leads to something called 'acid_burn.' I NEED you to find this bear and make him DELETE THAT POST. My social life is OVER."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track acid_burn through cyberspace
  • Make him undo the damage to your friend's reputation
  • Why is a bear hacker targeting random teens?
